WHITE_SESSION.description: Qr.Js ile oluşturduğunuz özel session kodu. Type here yours White Session.

SUDO.description: Leave blank if you don't know how to use it! Sudo mode; Your number must be an international number. So you should have your number after the country code. Example: 1205xxxxxxxxx (USA number +1)

LANGUAGE.description: Bot language. English => en,  Malayalam => ml, Indonesia => ID

ALL_CAPTION.description: Caption for  some images and videos generated by whitedevil bot

CALL_BLOCK.description: THIS IS ANTI-CALL BLOCKING SYSTEM ...IT WILL BLOCK WHEN SOME CALL U ...IF YOU NEED IT TURN ON => (true) else to TURN OFF =>(false).

BGM_FILTER.description: If you likes bgm you can write 'true'. Otherwise false

AUTO_STICKER.description: If you likes bgm you can write 'true'. Otherwise false

AUTO_VIDEO.description: If you likes video you can write 'true'. Otherwise false

BGM_DURATION.description: FUNNY BGM DURATION  codded by SAIDALI

THUMB_IMG.description: If you need a different thumbnail,  you can add Base64 String of your image.you can convert Base64 String from https://codebeautify.org/image-to-base64-converter [Base64 String]

ANTİ_LİNK.description: Link Engelleme Sistemi. Link Blocking System.

AUTO_BİO.description: Duruma otomatik tarih ve zaman eklemek için true yapın. Set true for auto date, time in biography.

ALL_LINK_BAN.description: Link Blocking System.- this one blocks all link

TALKING_WHITEDEVIL.description: Hesabınızı bir Chatbot'a Çevirin! Turn your account into a chatbot!

NO_LOG.description: Hata logu görmek istemiyorsanız true yapın. Set true if you don't want to see error log.

SEND_READ.description: Görüldü atmak istiyorsanız true yazın. Write true if you want to throw seen.

HEROKU.description: Herokuda çalışıyorsa true yazın. If it is running in Heroku, type true.

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Herokuda API Keyiniz. Heroku API Key.

MUTE_MESSAGE.description: Düzenlenebilir Mute Mesajı. Customizable Mute Message! Use => default, to change back.

THERI_LIST.description: bad word ban...  add the bad words you dont allow in your grp (THERI_KICK must be true to run this feature , and dont change the 1st word ) example: plk-dqz,f**k,d**k
bad word ban...  add the bad words you dont allow in your grp (THERI_KICK must be true to run this feature) example: plk-dqz,f**k,d**k

WEL_GIF.description: Fill here any gif link if you selected gif as WEELCOME

BYE_GIF.description: Fill here any gif link if you selected gif as WEELCOME

BLOCK_CHAT.description: Choose in which chat the bot won't work there. Ex: 905xxxx && 905xxxx-1xxx or 905xxxx,905xxx...

WORK_TYPE.description: WhiteDevil Working Type. If you use “public”, everyone can use the bot. Else if you use “private”, only you can use your bot.and if you use “admin”, only admin can use bot and not all feature (only features needed to maintain a standerd group)
